flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Connect the circle pieces into three leg joints each and connect them together with pipes that fit snugly in the sockets.  Then tie the full mat on.
lines.text_raw: Connect the circle pieces into three leg joints each and connect them together with pipes that fit snugly in the sockets.  Then tie the full mat on.

lines.text: Now get a snack and a tall drink to enjoy while relaxing on your new rocking hammock!
lines.text_raw: Now get a snack and a tall drink to enjoy while relaxing on your new rocking hammock!

guide.summary: Make a broken trampoline into a rocking hammock.
guide.title: Rocking Trampoline Hammock
